backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor implementing user profiles, posts, friends, reports, validation, and rate limiting with various data structures and helper functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining color variables and themes for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the root React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component controlling authentication, age verification, and main app routing with theming and loading states.
frontend/src/components/feed/PostCard.ts: UI component rendering an individual feed post with like, delete, friend request, and report actions.
frontend/src/components/feed/PostCompose: Component for creating new posts with length validation, submission handling, and feedback messages.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendRe: Renders pending friend requests with profile info and accept/decline actions using mutations and toasts.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendsL: Displays a list of friends with profile details, loading states, and genre badges.
Defines the main app layout with navigation, mobile menu, and page routing via local state.
frontend/src/components/report/ReportDia: Provides a dialog for submitting content reports with reason selection, details, validation, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/system/ErrorBoun: React error boundary that displays an error card with details and a reload option when exceptions occur.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity loading using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, feeds, posts, and mutations interacting with the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/genres.ts: Provides helpers for genre labels and a predefined list of genre options.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into relative or date strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AgeVerificationPage.t: Renders age verification and profile creation form with validation and mutation submission.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Displays the community feed with post creation and a list of posts.
frontend/src/pages/FriendsPage.tsx: Shows friends and friend requests in tabbed sections after loading data.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with login button, hero layout, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Provides user profile viewing and editing with validation and update mutations.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Renders the settings UI with sign‑out functionality and detailed information about custom domain rules and examples.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrors.ts: Converts backend error messages into cleaner, user‑friendly errors with specific handling for validation, authorization, and rate limiting.
frontend/src/utils/buildInfo.ts: Provides utilities to read build timestamp/version from environment variables and format them for display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validates display names according to length and character rules and provides a short description of those rules.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend styling system.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current metadata, requirements, architecture notes, issues, and implemented features.
